item.title: Publications
item.description: Peer-Reviewed Articles Siew, C. S. Q., Pelczarski, K., Yaruss, J. S., & Vitevitch, M. S. (2017). Using the OASES-A to illustrate how network analysis can be applied to understand the experience of stuttering. Journal of Communication Disorders, 65, 1-9. Article | [Popular press article] Siew, C. S. Q. (2017). The influence of 2-hop network density on spoken word recognition. Psychonomic Bulletin and Review, 24(2), 496-502. Article | KU ScholarWorks Vitevitch, M.

item.title: Conferences
item.description: 2017 Siew, C. S. Q., & Vitevitch, M. S. (2017, November). The Phonographic Network of Language: Using Network Science to Investigate the Phonological and Orthographic Similarity Structure of Language. Poster to be presented at the 58th Annual Meeting of the Psychonomic Society. Vancouver, Canada. Chan, K. Y., & Siew, C. S. Q. (2017, November). Dynamics of Lexical Competition during Foreign-Accented Word Recognition. Poster to be presented at the 58th Annual Meeting of the Psychonomic Society.
